abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn, when you play Magmortar from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

effect.en: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
You may move a [R] Energy card attached to Magmortar to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
